mapper.select: select so.*, su.nickname as `leaderUserName`, suo.position_code as `positionCode`, suo.position_name as `positionName`, su.mobile as `mobile`, su.email as `email` from sys_user su, sys_user_org suo, sys_org so where su.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and su.id = suo.sys_user_id and suo.sys_org_id = so.id and suo.deleted = 0 and so.deleted = 0 and so.disabled = 0 order by so.`level`, so.sort
